page.title: 13The garage
page.content: The garage was established in 1924.It has always been run by the same family.There are 4 people employed. There is 1 from Welshampton,2 from Wem and 1 from Ellesmere.There are repairs made to cars and agricultural vehicles. The opening hours are -week days 8 a.m.until 6 p.m. and Sunday 10 a.m. until 1 p.m.They only sell petrol not diesel oil. There is other work carried out from the garage including electrical and water installations.The work has changed because cars ,machinery and the tools to repair them have improved over the years. Egerton's garage started to operate the school mini bus service in 1970.
